questions.title: No sensitive information exposed in the repository
questions.description: For example: secret token, mailer details, CartoDB access, Amazon keys, user data

questions.title: Standardised config store or description of a non-standard config in the README
questions.description: For example: database.yml & secrets.yml is standard for Rails 4

questions.title: No hardcoded urls, emails or other pieces of configuration in code
questions.description: For example: third-party API urls, notification emails

questions.title: Relevant passwords shared through the Admin Password DB
questions.description: For example: access details to any third party APIs

questions.title: Deployment script with multi-stage deployments
questions.description: For example: Capistrano for Rails applications

questions.title: Number of releases to keep limited through the deployment script
questions.description: For example: 5 releases for production, 3 for staging

questions.title: Bundled gems up to date
questions.description: For example: unsupported gems, gems with security flaws, issues reported by Gemnasium

questions.title: Production instance documented in Labs?
questions.description: Any temporary or experimental instances should be documented as well, no zombie sites

questions.title: Staging instance documented in Labs
questions.description: Any temporary or experimental instances should be documented as well, no zombie sites

questions.title: Availability monitoring configured for all subsystems
questions.description: For example: nagios checks for web application & sidekiq workers

questions.title: Site renders properly in IE
questions.description: Most of the time versions 9+ need to be considered

questions.title: Site renders properly on mobile devices
